text: Can you share your fields.json for this module? The `visibility` value of the module in particular.
is there a way to match against regex rather than just regex_replace?
I was wondering, when using `is_listing_view` on the blog listing template, what is the largest number allowed in the `Number of posts per listing page` field in the blog setting?

the link on this article: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/blog-template-markup>, to this webpage is a 404: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/website-settings#number-of-posts-per-listing-page|post limit in Blog Settings>

Thank you for reporting I’ve fixed that link.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/website-settings#number-of-posts-per-listing-page>

The max number of posts is a setting you control under blog settings.

I believe there is a max number of posts per listing page you can display. I don’t know it off the top of my head. I will check on this and update the doc.
